import React, { useRef } from "react"; //create account and import import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; function Contact() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_glc03ds", "template_r9mxfg6", form.current, "OeaSk6ExidzL4ZQb0" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); }; return (
